lead_paragraph: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak could have been the DeLorean of watches. Instead it became a must-have for collectors and casual enthusiasts alike.
snippet: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak could have been the DeLorean of watches. Instead it became a must-have for collectors and casual enthusiasts alike.

headline.main: How the Royal Oak Watch Became a Cult Classic

abstract: Luxury sports watch Royal Oak, line introduced by Audemars Piguet in 1972, has garnered cult following over past four decades due to its chunky stainless-steel design.
